Description: The handle of a bifacial knife: of brown flint, thickest at the lower edge and terminating in a downcurving point. Pressure flaked surfaces.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Djet, Bears excavator's mark, Z.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XIV, group marked Z
